product.text:
The Tigger Movie

Based on the 2000 Disney animated family film, this captivating tale centers around Tigger’s longing to find his real family. The story unfolds when Tigger, disheartened by the differences between him and his friends, begins a quest for “a family fulla tiggers.” Though his search for his heritage isn’t fruitful, Tigger discovers that he has what he has been searching for all along—a real family of faithful friends. This heartwarming narrative reinforces the importance of individuality in forming strong, loyal friendships.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to identify the characteristics of a good friend. Encourage her to include traits such as kindness, loyalty, good listening, and tolerance.
